name: sticky notes (v1)
description:
5 different types of sticky notes you can use to annotate your design mockups.


A single component with variants for:


Type:

💡 Notes & ideas

✅ Specs for devs

🤝 Requirements

🚧 Remaining Work

❓ Open questions


Arrow direction:

Left, Right, Down, Up, None


Easily add your own labels for additional contexts.
